cyclone.name: BERYL
cyclone.current_location: about 1295 mi ESE of the Lesser Antilles
cyclone.trajectory: Accelerating west-to-west-northwest toward the Lesser Antilles; guidance keeps the small circulation south of Puerto Rico/Virgin Islands and expects it to open into a trough near 60–63°W late Sunday
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Not expected to make landfall – forecast to dissipate just east of the Lesser Antilles

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central & southern Lesser Antilles (Dominica to Barbados) where small storm could pass Sunday
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤3%) chance of brief tropical-storm-force gusts; otherwise 20–25 kt squalls possible late Sunday–Monday if remnants hold together
weather_observation.rainfall: Passing showers and squalls could total 1–2 inches, locally higher, late Sunday into Monday
